original_text: But one day righteous people will wear those clothes. Honest people will share the silver among themselves. But one day righteous people will wear those clothes.
korean_text: 그가 준비한 것을 의인이 입을 것이요 그의 은은 죄 없는 자가 차지할 것이며

sentences.original_text: But one day righteous people will wear those clothes.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 의인들은 언젠가 그 옷을 입을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Honest people will share the silver among themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 정직한 사람들은 은을 서로 나눌 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: But one day righteous people will wear those clothes.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 의인들은 언젠가 그 옷을 입을 것입니다.
